ygData.subject: Re: I never thought I'd see the day!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Gratz on 50!  I too thought I d never see 50.  Now the AA question rears it s ugly head.  Get them now, wait for more levels, wait until 65!  Now there s a
ygData.messageBody:
Gratz on 50! I too thought I'd never see 50. Now the AA question
rears it's ugly head. Get them now, wait for more levels, wait until
65! Now there's a question!

Tuldayen Grimblade
Pathfinder of Tunare
Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=761750


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Ron Gillespie" <rgillispie@t...>
wrote:
>
> But my druid has finally dinged level 50!!! WOOT!!!! *MAD
CELEBRATION*
>
> Man, it's been a long time coming! If I feel this ecstatic about
level 50 think how I'm gonna be at 65! by the time I hti that
they'll have raised the level cap to 70!
>
> I just recently purchased LDON but my cable modem got disconnected
so I could not play for like 2 months. I moved to a new place and
got cable modem reconnected and finally had my first adventure
tonight!! I did the Collect 28 Mummy Wrappings in Mistmore, and also
the Kill 60 in Mistmore. Successful on both and dinged 50 to boot!!
>
> Time to start working on my epic I guess!
>
> Raido Covenfall
> 50 ELF DRU
> Cazic Thule Server
>
>
> aka Wulfric Rennison
